AdvancedServoSequences.Name: All Servos to PositionMin
AdvancedServoSequences.Description: Parallel Set all servos to PostionMin (-1) (based on TYPE) in Parallel VelocityLimit: 500

AdvancedServoSequences.Name: All Servos to PositionMax
AdvancedServoSequences.Description: Set all servos to PostionMax (-2) (based on TYPE) Sequentially VelocityLimit: 1000

AdvancedServoSequences.Name: All Servos to PositionMin Slow
AdvancedServoSequences.Description: Parallel Set all servos to PostionMin Slowly (-1) (based on TYPE) VelocityLimit: 75

AdvancedServoSequences.Name: All Servos to PositionMax Slow
AdvancedServoSequences.Description: Set all servos to PostionMax Slowly (-2) (based on TYPE) VelocityLimit: 100

AdvancedServoSequences.Name: Reset Position Limits (RPL)
AdvancedServoSequences.Description: Resets PositionMin and PositionMax to defaults for DEFAULT device
AdvancedServoSequences.UsageNotes: Can be called with Servos not Engaged

AdvancedServoSequences.Name: Servo4
AdvancedServoSequences.Description: Moves Servo 4, then 5, then 6 using NextSequence

AdvancedServoSequences.Name: Parallel All (PA)
AdvancedServoSequences.UsageNotes: Servos expected to be Centered and Engaged

AdvancedServoSequences.Name: Acceleration(10000) VelocityLimit(5000)
AdvancedServoSequences.Description: Set Initial Acceleration and VelocityLimit Servos 0-7

AdvancedServoSequences.Name: Acceleration(5000) VelocityLimit(1000)
AdvancedServoSequences.Description: Set Initial Acceleration and VelocityLimit Servos 0-7

AdvancedServoSequences.Name: Acceleration(500) VelocityLimit(100)
AdvancedServoSequences.Description: Set Initial Acceleration and VelocityLimit Servos 0-7

AdvancedServoSequences.Name: Acceleration(50) VelocityLimit(25)
AdvancedServoSequences.Description: Set Initial Acceleration and VelocityLimit Servos 0-7

AdvancedServoSequences.Name: Acceleration(25) VelocityLimit(10)
AdvancedServoSequences.Description: Set Initial Acceleration and VelocityLimit Servos 0-7
